meta_description: The Everson Museum of Art is located in the heart of Syracuse, New York. Explore our permanent collection, and ever-changing exhibitions. Classes, camps for kids, workshops, seminars, and more. There is so much to see and do at the Everson, a true cultural center of the Central New York Community. Come visit the Everson!
hours_text:
# Visit the  
**Everson**

The Everson Museum of Art is located in downtown Syracuse on the corner of Harrison and South State Streets, across from the Oncenter.

### Everson Museum of Art

401 Harrison Street  
Syracuse, NY 13202  
[(315) 474 6064](tel:3154746064)  
[[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#8ce9fae9feffe3e2cce9fae9feffe3e2a2e3feeb)

#### Administrative  
Office Hours

Weekdays: 9:00am – 5:00pm

#### Facility Rentals

For event and facility rental inquiries contact:

**Jennifer Neuner  
**[(315) 474 6064](tel:3154746064) x308  
[[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#fd9793988893988fbd988b988f8e9293d3928f9a)

#### Galleries and  
Museum Shop

**Hours**

**Mon./Tues:** Closed  
**Wed.** 11:00am – 5:00pm   
**Thurs.** 11:00am – 8:00pm  
**Fri.** 11:00am – 5:00pm  
**Sat.** 10:00am – 5:00pm  
**Sun.** 10:00am – 5:00pm

#### Holidays Closed:

  * **Juneteenth**
  * **July 4th**
  * **Thanksgiving Day**
  * **Christmas Day**
  * **New Year’s Day**

#### Admissions

**$14** – Adults  
**$10** – Seniors (65+), Students  
**$5** – Children 6-12  
**$2** – with EBT card

**FREE** – Everson Members, Children 5 and under, Military (w/ ID)

**Pay What You Wish** : Wednesdays All Day, and Thursdays from 5:00 – 8:00 pm.

Family Days and Community Days are offered throughout the year.

#### Accessibility

The Everson Museum of Art is accessible to all. If you are planning a visit to the Museum and have concerns, please call the Administrative Office at (315) 4...
admission_text:
# **Join the Journey.**

### Become a Member Today or Renew Your Membership.

### **Become a Member or Renew Today!**

At the Everson Museum of Art, members are at the heart of everything we do. Your membership not only grants you access to exclusive benefits but also plays a critical role in supporting our innovative programs, exhibitions, and educational initiatives.

By becoming a member, you directly contribute to the vitality of Syracuse’s premier art institution. Your support allows us to continue our mission of fostering creativity, community engagement, and lifelong learning. Whether you’re exploring groundbreaking exhibitions, enjoying priority access to our camps and classes, or attending members-only events, your membership enhances your connection to the arts and enriches the cultural landscape of Central New York.

**All Memberships Include the Following benefits:**

  * Free museum admission
  * Free admission to opening receptions
  * Free guest passes
  * 20% discount on classes
  * 10% discount at the gift shop and the Everson’s café, Louise
  * Early bird access to events & programs
  * Subscription to the Everson Bulletin
  * Reciprocal benefits, including free or heavily discounted admission to 30+ museums through the Empire State Program.

**General Memberships:**_Click on the level below you wish you wish to add to your cart._

  * [**Individual:**](https://21573a.blackbaudhosting.com/21573a/Individual-Membership?mpl=10F5F085-DD8D-480D-BF72-A2AADABBCE58...
collections_text:
# This is the Everson  
**A Museum**  
**of Firsts.**

## Everson  
is for  
**Lovers**

**This Valentine’s Day join us for a night of inspiring**  
**art, lively entertainment, and warm company.**

Step into an enchanting atmosphere where  
music, movement, and creativity set the stage  
for connection and romance. Whether shared  
with someone special or enjoyed on your own,  
the evening promises beauty, delight, and a  
little magic around every corner.

[RSVP Here](https://everson.org/connect/everson-is-for-lovers-valentines-celebration/)

## At the **Everson**

  * [](https://everson.org/explore/current-exhibitions/touching-history-exploring-the-scarab-vase/)

[](https://everson.org/explore/current-exhibitions/touching-history-exploring-the-scarab-vase/)

### [_Touching History: Exploring the Scarab Vase_](https://everson.org/explore/current-exhibitions/touching-history-exploring-the-scarab-vase/)

****

Have you ever wondered what it would feel like to touch history through Adelaide Alsop Robineau’s delicately carved Scarab Vase? Thanks to the ingenuity of Budmen Industries, a 3D printed replica is now displayed next to the original masterpiece, for visitors to experience hands-on....

[Read More ›](https://everson.org/explore/current-exhibitions/touching-history-exploring-the-scarab-vase/)
